article_title: Fact Checker: Trump's claim he would save billions on prescription drugs
article_text:
Fact Checker: Trump's claim he would save billions on prescription drugs

Photo: Matt Rourke, AP Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks during a...

"We are not allowed to negotiate drug prices. Can you believe it? We pay about $300 billion more than we are supposed to, than if we negotiated the price. So there's $300 billion on day one we solve."

We pay about $300 billion more than we are supposed to, than if we negotiated the price.
